segments.text: I see the woman standing there, drying a plate with a disinterested expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling over the sink, creating a small lake at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to notice the mess at all, which is a bit surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily she could slip and fall if she doesn’t pay attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are clearly up to something behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing precariously on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, her hand outstretched, as if she’s already tasted the cookies in her mind.
segments.speaker: PAR
